name: Mario Bros 1983 Janky Remake
description:
Well if you don't know by the title; this is an Unreal Engine remake of the 1983 Mario game.

It is supposed to have all those features that we use to like: the Koopa (shellcrepper), the crab (Sides Tepper), the bug dude that flies (fighterfly), and the ice thingy (slipice). 

The bonus mode and the other level variations are here as well! (no multiplayer to be found here)

Also! this game supports a gamepad :) 

Hope you like it!

This project was made with the intention of literally getting more experience with the engine (at that point UE4) and adding more content to my portfolio.

Later I wanted to use it to fill up with some content on some youtube channel but sadly I don't have the energy to edit a video of this magnitude. After one year (and a half.. I think) got fed up and decided to upload the game and for my youtube just made a bare one to kind of say I "archived"  both objectives 

Probably the bad thing here is the level of fidelity I got doing this remake of the 1983 Mario Bros game. Of course, I was not going to have a headache getting a 1:1 so when it looked acceptable I stopped with the development. 

If you can't manage to open the game maybe is because I have it compressed with win rar, most probably you'll need to download WinRAR (or similar) first to extract this thing and be able to open the game

  • Mario Bros 1983 Janky Remake 
  • 1 Player
  • Controller Compatible
  • Unreal Engine 4.24, Blender for models, Audacity for sounds, and Paint.net along Gimp for textures
  • Nintendo, you know what belongs to you. Don't sue, please
